wikipedia_page.main: Derek William Wood (born 12 November 1959) is a Scottish retired football right winger and forward who made over 140 appearances in the Scottish League for Queen's Park. He also played for Albion Rovers, Clyde and East Stirlingshire.

response: * Derek Wood (author) (1930–2003), author of The Narrow Margin and books about aviation
* Derek Wood (British Army soldier), British Army corporal killed by the Provisional Irish Republican Army
* Derek Wood (barrister), principal of St Hugh's College, Oxford 1991–2002
